amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 113-339 to promote the Secretary of the Interior's authority to consider climate change when making decisions related to recreation and conservation on public lands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 113-339 to promote the Secretary of the Interior's authority to consider climate change when making decisions related to recreation and conservation on public lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 242 (Roll no. 39).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 242 (Roll no. 39).
